A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Very disappointing. The lack of story development and jumping around hurts this one. There were some bright spots: a brief revisit of Maz\, the code breaker (not the thrown together arc to get to him)\, the humor at the right spots (not all of the humor was well done). In short\, being a long time fan (the 1st trilogy was ok)\, I am not interested in EP9. Something has been lost since the move to Disney.
